snippet: The Federal Reserve said all 12 of its regions reported growth this summer, and the Commerce Department said that orders for factory goods shot up in July.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports economic growth across all regions of United States in July and August 2014, while Commerce Dept report shows increase in business orders for factory goods in July.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve said all 12 of its regions reported growth this summer, and the Commerce Department said that orders for factory goods shot up in July.

headline.main: Fed Reports Expansion as Economy Improves
headline.print_headline: Fed Reports Expansion as Economy Improves
